verses.1: Pasian in hong hehpihna tawh hih nasep hong pia ahih manin ka thaneem het kei uh hi.
verses.2: Ka thuhilhna uh ah mite khembawl loin, Pasian thu zong a man lopi-in ka gen kei uh a, tua bang a zumhuai simtham tatnate ka zang het kei uh hi. Pasian muhna ah a langtangin thuman takin ka gamta uh a, mi khempeuh a lungkim theih nadingin ka hanciam uh hi.
verses.3: Lungdamna thu ka hilhte uh kitel lo ahihleh zong siatna a thuak mite ading bekin a kitel lo hi ding hi.
verses.4: Tua bang mite pen hih leitung pasian gilote in a lungsim mit uh tawsak ahih manin um lo uh a, Pasian tawh a kibang teekteek Khris minthanna hangin amaute tungah a hong taang lungdamna thu khuavak mu thei lo uh hi.
verses.5: Bang hang hiam cih leh koteʼ hilh thu pen komauʼ thu hi lo a, Khris Jesu pen Topa ahi hi, ci-in a hilh ka hi uh a, kote pen Khris hangin nomauʼ na a semte ka hi uh hi.
verses.6: “Khuamial sung panin khuavak taang hen,” a ci Pasian mah in Jesuʼ maitang a taangsak Pasianʼ vangliatna thu theih nading khuavak ka ngah theih nadingun kote lungsim sungah khuavak hong taangsak hi.
verses.7: Ahi zongin vangliatna taktak Pasian aʼ hi a, kote aʼ hi lo hi, ci-in a kilat nadingin kha tawh kisai na manpha a nei kote pen na kikoihna leibeel tawh a kibang bek ka hi uh hi.
verses.8: Gimna ka tuah zelzel uh hangin ka si kei uh a, lunghihmawhna ka tuah zelzel uh hangin ka lungkia kei uh a,
verses.9: gal tampi ka neih uh hangin pawl ka kitasam ngei kei uh a, liamna baina ka tuah uh hangin ka si kei uh hi.
verses.10: Koteʼ pum tung panin Jesuʼ nuntakna a kilat theih nadingin hih ka leitung pumpi nuntakna mahmah uh ah zong Jesuʼ sihna bangmah ka thuak zelzel uh hi.
verses.11: Tua ahih manin koteʼ leitung pumpi ah Jesu Khris nuntakna a kilat nadingin Jesu hangin ka leitung nuntak sungun sih nading lauhuaina ka phu kha tawntung uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ahih manin kote adingin sih nading a kisepsep laitakin noteʼ nuntak nading a kisem niloh ahi hi.
verses.13: Lai Siangtho in, “Um ka hih manin ka gen hi,” a cih mah bangin kote in zong um ka hih uh manin a gen ka hi uh hi.
verses.14: Topa Jesu a hingkiksak pa in Jesu mah tawh kote zong hong hingkiksak khawmin note tawh ama omna ah hong paipih khawm ding hi, ci-in ka thei uh hi.
verses.15: Hih thute khempeuh note ading a kikhualna hi a, Pasianʼ hehpihna in mi tam ban semsem leh mi a tam semsem mah in Pasianʼ minthan nadingin lungdam ko-in thu ngen ding uh hi.
verses.16: Tua thu hangin ka lungkia tuan kei uh hi. Koteʼ leitung pumpi in damdamin muat lam a manawh ahi zongin ka kha nuntakna uh a nini-in thaksuak semsem hi.
verses.17: Tu hun laitakin tomno sung lungkhamna ka thuakte uh in ka thuakna uh sangin nakpi takin a lian zaw tawntung minthanna sung hong tunpih ding hi.
verses.18: Bang hang hiam cih leh a kimu thei nate a mitsuan ka hi kei uh a, a kimu thei lo nate a mitsuan ka hi uh hi. A kimu thei nate tomno sung bek kimang a, a kimu thei lo nate a tawntungin a kip ahi hi.
